marketing.short_description: A concise, compelling description (150 chars max)
marketing.long_description: A detailed description of your plugin, what it does, how it works, and its benefits. This can be multiple paragraphs and should provide comprehensive information about your product.
use_cases: Use case 1: Describe a specific scenario where your plugin excels
Use case 2: Describe another application of your plugin
marketing.target_audience: Describe your ideal users (experience level, trading style, etc.)
unique_selling_points: What makes your plugin different from similar offerings?
Why should users choose your plugin over alternatives?

market_condition_analysis.bull_market: Excellent performance with high win rate
market_condition_analysis.bear_market: Implements protective measures to limit drawdown
market_condition_analysis.ranging_market: Moderate performance with reduced position sizing
market_condition_analysis.high_volatility: Adapts by reducing position size and widening stops
market_condition_analysis.low_volatility: May underperform due to fewer trading opportunities

performance.optimization_potential: High - multiple parameters can be fine-tuned for specific markets

documentation.setup_instructions: Step-by-step instructions for installing and configuring your plugin

usage_examples.name: Basic Usage
usage_examples.code:
# Example code showing basic usage
from trading_bot import create_strategy

strategy = create_strategy('your_strategy_id', param1=value1)
signals = strategy.generate_signals(market_data)
usage_examples.description: Description of the basic usage example

usage_examples.name: Advanced Configuration
usage_examples.code:
# Example code showing advanced configuration
from trading_bot import create_strategy

strategy = create_strategy('your_strategy_id', param1=value1, param2=value2)
signals = strategy.generate_signals(market_data)
performance = strategy.get_performance_summary()
usage_examples.description: Description of the advanced configuration example

configuration_presets.name: Conservative
configuration_presets.description: Lower risk settings for capital preservation

configuration_presets.name: Aggressive
configuration_presets.description: Higher risk settings for maximum returns

author_info.name: Your Name
author_info.bio: Brief professional biography highlighting your expertise and experience

legal.disclaimer: Trading involves risk. Past performance is not indicative of future results.
